select relation.tai_cd,relation.tana_cd,relation.tana_type, COALESCE( datas.faceNum,0) as faceNum,coalesce(datas.skuNum,0) as skuNum from planocycle.work_priority_order_restrict_relation relation left join ( select tai_cd,tana_cd,tana_type, sum(face_fact) as faceNum,count(jan_cd) as skuNum from planocycle.work_priority_order_result_data where priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} and face_fact != 0 GROUP BY tai_cd,tana_cd,tana_type) datas
on datas.tai_cd = relation.tai_cd and datas.tana_cd = relation.tana_cd and relation.tana_type = datas.tana_type
where relation.company_cd = #{companyCd} and relation.author_cd = #{authorCd} and relation.priority_order_cd =#{priorityOrderCd} order by tai_cd,tana_cd

select tai_cd, tana_cd, count ( jan ) "skuNum", sum ( face_count ) "faceNum" from planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data ptsdata left join planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data_jandata jandata on ptsdata.id = jandata.pts_cd where ptsdata.priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} group by tai_cd,tana_cd order by tai_cd,tana_cd

select datas.jan_cd as janCd,COALESCE(jans.jan_nm,mstpl.jan_nm) as janName, datas.tai_cd as taiCd,datas.tana_cd as tanaCd, COALESCE(jans.irisu,mstpl.irisu) as zokusei7,COALESCE(jans.pkg,mstpl.pkg) as zokusei5, COALESCE(jans.alcohol,mstpl.alcohol) as zokusei8,COALESCE(jans.brand,mstpl.brand) as zokusei9,COALESCE(jans.kikaku,mstpl.kikaku) as zokusei6, COALESCE(jans.scat1cd_val,mstpl.scat1cd_val) as zokusei1,COALESCE(jans.scat2cd_val,mstpl.scat2cd_val) as zokusei2,COALESCE(jans.scat3cd_val,mstpl.scat3cd_val) as zokusei3 ,COALESCE(jans.scat4cd_val,mstpl.scat4cd_val) as zokusei4, datas.tana_type as restrictType,sort_rank as rank,datas.face_fact as faceNum, case when janNew.jan_new is null then 2 else 1 end newRank from planocycle.work_priority_order_result_data datas left join planocycle.work_priority_order_restrict_result rmst on rmst.restrict_cd = datas.restrict_cd and rmst.company_cd = #{item.companyCd} and rmst.author_cd = #{authorCd} and rmst.priority_order_cd = #{item.priorityOrderCd} left join masterdb.jan_mst jans on jans.jan_cd = datas.jan_cd left join masterdb.jan_mst_planocycle mstpl on mstpl.jan_cd = datas.jan_cd left join planocycle.work_priority_order_jan_new janNew on datas.jan_cd = janNew.jan_new and janNew.priority_order_cd = datas.priority_order_cd and datas.company_cd = janNew.company_cd where datas.restrict_cd = #{item.restrictCd} and datas.company_cd = #{item.companyCd} and datas.author_cd = #{authorCd} and datas.adopt_flag=1 and datas.priority_order_cd = #{item.priorityOrderCd} order by sort_rank,newRank

select DISTINCT datas.jan_cd as janCd,COALESCE(jans.jan_nm,mstpl.jan_nm) as janName, datas.tai_cd as taiCd,datas.tana_cd as tanaCd, COALESCE(jans.irisu,mstpl.irisu) as zokusei7,COALESCE(jans.pkg,mstpl.pkg) as zokusei5, COALESCE(jans.alcohol,mstpl.alcohol) as zokusei8,COALESCE(jans.brand,mstpl.brand) as zokusei9,COALESCE(jans.kikaku,mstpl.kikaku) as zokusei6, COALESCE(jans.scat1cd_val,mstpl.scat1cd_val) as zokusei1,COALESCE(jans.scat2cd_val,mstpl.scat2cd_val) as zokusei2,COALESCE(jans.scat3cd_val,mstpl.scat3cd_val) as zokusei3 ,COALESCE(jans.scat4cd_val,mstpl.scat4cd_val) as zokusei4, datas.tana_type as restrictType,sort_rank as rank,datas.face_fact as faceNum,case when janNew.jan_new is null then 2 else 1 end newRank from planocycle.work_priority_order_result_data datas left join planocycle.work_priority_order_restrict_result rmst on rmst.restrict_cd = datas.restrict_cd left join masterdb.jan_mst jans on jans.jan_cd = datas.jan_cd left join masterdb.jan_mst_planocycle mstpl on mstpl.jan_cd = datas.jan_cd left join planocycle.work_priority_order_jan_new janNew on datas.jan_cd = janNew.jan_new and janNew.priority_order_cd = datas.priority_order_cd and datas.company_cd = janNew.company_cd where datas.tai_cd = #{item.taiCd} and datas.tana_cd = #{item.tanaCd} and datas.tana_type = #{item.tanaType} and datas.company_cd = #{item.companyCd} and datas.author_cd =#{authorCd} and datas.priority_order_cd = #{item.priorityOrderCd} order by sort_rank,newRank
